participant_1.background:
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.
My most exotic travel experience was when I went to Thailand and saw the floating markets.
I have a large family due to my viking heritage.
ariel is my favorite princess.
my friends don t call my by my real name.

participant_2.background:
My weight is 160 pounds.
i m easily agitated.
I drink milk to help me digest my large meals.
i don t get along with my family.
I listened to my favorite songs on my tablet while getting ready for my last birthday.

content.text: I went to Thailand once and it was so amazing!
I have never been to a foreign country, but I would love to go to Thailand!
It was so cool to see the floating markets! My friends don t call me by my real name either, they call me Ariel because I love the Little Mermaid so much.
Oh my gosh, that s so cute! I have two nicknames, one is my middle name and the other is a shortened version of my first name.
Wow, you have a large family! I have a large family too, due to my Viking heritage.
I don t get along with my family very well, so I m glad that I m not the only one with a large family.
I m sorry to hear that, but I m glad you have a lot of friends to support you!
Thanks! I am really grateful for my friends.
Me too, they are the best!
I hope you have a great day!
